remarks: The value of isomorphism H at the lattice unit is the set of all vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dih1.m $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
dih1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dih1.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dih1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( I ` .1. ) = V ) $.
